content.title: Elementary school
content.description: I learned basic things like reading and writing here.

content.title: VMBO
content.description:
I went here because I was really too young for high school. I messed up the final test at elementary school.


 I didn't really like it here and after a year I went to another school.

content.title: HSGE
content.description: I went to this school because it offered extra help with learning.

content.title: Filling stocks
content.description: I worked here for some time when I had spare time and wanted some money. I quit when it got busier for me.

content.title: HSGE / Grammar school
content.description:
When looking for different schools this one made a good expression on me.


 Here I found out that I liked programming. I decided to go to a higher level of education when at this school.
